Select your Assessment from the list below. You can search for your Assessment by entering its name or status in the Find text box below and clicking the "Go" button. 20 Assessments are displayed at a time. Click the "Previous Page" or "Next Page" links to view additional Assessments. New Assessments can be added from a Trainer detail page.

COPY EXISTING ASSESSMENT: To copy an existing assessment, enter the assessment # to be copied and click the "Copy" button. All questions and choices will be duplicated.
Certificate
minutes
Select whether this assessment is to be internally defined within Pinnacle, externally accessed from another system or a Master Certification for other certifications.
Specify the number of the first question for the assessment. If zero, the first page/sequence question will be used.
The final result of the assessment is calculated by one of the following methods. (Formula=name:P1+Q2+%80;...)
Specify the following system interfaces for creating and editing this external assessment.
Specify a limit to the number of times a member may take this Assessment (zero = no limit).
Specify the number of days a member must wait before retaking this assessment (zero = no wait).
To recommend Courses related to this Assessment, Enter up to 10 Course #s separated by commas.
To specify the other certifications required for this Master Certification, Enter up to 10 assessment #s separated by commas.
Specify the certification program folder #, optionally followed by a comma and the number of months to complete the certification courses.
